prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Synth Lead, Strings, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Guitar, Synth Lead, Strings, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Synth Lead, Strings, and Bass, with no Piano.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Drums, Guitar, Synth Lead, Strings, and Bass, Piano not included.
